original_text: Then Asa was angry with the seer and put him in the stocks in prison, for he was in a rage with him because of this. And Asa inflicted cruelties upon some of the people at the same time.
korean_text: 아사가 노하여 선견자를 옥에 가두었으니 이는 그의 말에 크게 노하였음이며 그 때에 아사가 또 백성 중에서 몇 사람을 학대하였더라

sentences.original_text: Then Asa was angry with the seer
and put him in the stocks in prison
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그를 옥에 가두어 족쇄를 채웠습니다

sentences.original_text: for he was in a rage with him because of this
sentences.korean_translation: 이 일로 인해 그에게 크게 분노했기 때문입니다

sentences.original_text: And Asa inflicted cruelties upon some of the people
sentences.korean_translation: 아사는 백성 중 몇 사람에게 잔혹한 행동을 했고
